author: llunerti
body:
**PR description:**

This PR adds three new DQMAnalyzer modules (one for each DT/CSC/RPC subsystem) + a common DQMHarvester module allowing to perform efficiency computation based on a cut-and-count tag-and-probe method. For each muon subsystem various plots will be produced:

- plots under "DQMData/Run _run_number_/_subsystem_/Run summary/Segment_TnP/Task" directory  (_subsystem_ = DT, CSC, RPC): different 1D/2D plots (depending on the subsystem) displaying the efficiency
- plots under "DQMData/Run _run_number_/_subsystem_/Run summary/Segment_TnP/detailed" directory: various plots displaying the distribution of different kinematic variables associated to probe muon and to tag-and-probe pair

My last presentation at DPGO meeting could be useful: 
[https://indico.cern.ch/event/1096538/contributions/4613015/attachments/2344869/3998311/Update_tnp_inDQM.pdf](url)

**PR validation:**

New modules tested running runTheMatrix in CMSSW_12_1_0_pre3: 
`runTheMatrix.py -l 4.22,7.3,1330.0,10042.0,10824.0,23234.0,140.53 -i all --ibeos`

FYI: @battibass
title: Adding modules for tag-and-probe efficiency computation in DQMOffline
